thread.section_title: eHealthInsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eHealthInsurance | ehealthinsurance.com
thread.title: Kathleen Beacham

author: Kathleen Beacham
title: Kathleen Beacham
text: I was totally disappointed in their services. The only thing they provided me was the name of a company that provided services in my area. They gave me wrong phone numbers; told me my application was accepted when it was not; told me to make a payment when I could not (application had not been accepted); told me to expect phone calls which never came. I'm very disappointed. If they did their job well they could provide a helpful resource in the confusing mess of insurance. As it was they only further muddied the already cloudy water. They get a 2 / 5 stars as only 1 customer service person was helpful and greatly appreciated.
